Davis (née Cargill) bụ onye odee Canada
A maara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Achịcha Kwa ụbọchị anyị, bụ nke akpọrọ otu n'ime akwụkwọ kacha mma nke 2011 nke The Globe na Mail na The Boston Globe
na The Empty Room, akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara ị alcoholụbiga mmanya ókè
O bi ugbu a na Princeton, New Jersey ya na di ya, Zurich Financial Executive, Ron Davis, na nkịta ha, Bailey (The Rescuepoo)
Amụrụ na Montreal, Quebec, na Septemba 5, 1955, Davis biri na France ihe karịrị afọ iri (1994-2004), ma bi ugbu a na Princeton, New Jersey
Ná mmalite nke ọrụ ya, Davis bụ onye ndụmọdụ Timothy Findley, na Humber College School for Writers, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-abụ onye ndụmọdụ (2007-2009)
Ọ gara aga onye nchịkọta akụkọ European maka nyocha akwụkwọ akụkọ Canada site na 1999 ruo 2002.
Davis abụrụla onye ndụmọdụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji Humber maka ndị ode akwụkwọ na mmemme MFA nke Mahadum Guelph
Ọ kuziri ide akụkọ ifo na WICE (Paris); Mahadum America nke Paris; Nzukọ ndị ode akwụkwọ Geneva; na Nzukọ Ndị Odee nke Mahadum Seattle na Allihies, Ireland
Davis akụzikwarala akwụkwọ gbasara ide na Mahadum Trent, Mahadum Rider, Humber College na The Paris Writers' Workshop
Davis mere mmemme ide obodo na Princeton akpọrọ Sharpening the Quill site na 2006-2018.
Akpọrọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Grimoire nke Kensington Market otu n'ime "akwụkwọ kacha mma nke 2018" nke The Globe and Mail depụtara na aha mkpirisi maka ndị otu ndị ode akwụkwọ Canada Fred Kerner Award

Achịcha anyị kwa ụbọchị bụ ogologo aha maka ihe nrite Scotiabank Giller, ma kpọọ ya dị ka otu n'ime "akwụkwọ kacha mma nke 2011" site na The Globe and Mail, na "Kachasị Mma nke 2011" nke The Boston Globe ; The Empty Room (2007) ka akpọrọ otu n'ime akwụkwọ kacha mma nke afọ site na Toronto Star, The Globe & Mail, na Winnipeg Free Press; Obodo Radiant (2005) bụ onye ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite akụkọ ifo nke Rogers Writers' Trust
Oge isi ike (2002), ka ahọpụtara maka usoro nkuzi Robert Adams wee kpọọ otu n'ime akwụkwọ kacha ere nke afọ site na Amazon.ca
E mere nkuzi Adams na telivishọn na mmemme TVOntario Imprint
Ọchịchọ a na-emegharịbeghị (2008) bụ ogologo aha maka ReLit Awards
Edepụtakwala akụkọ ifo ya dị mkpụmkpụ maka CBC Literary Awards na ọ bụ onye nnata onyinye abụọ Mid-Career Writer Sustaining sitere na Kansụl Canada maka Arts, na 2000 na 2006.
